# Background Layer
# Width
32
# Height
12
# Ending type
-2
# Amount of sprites on sprite sheet width
2
# Amount of sprites on sprite sheet height
1

# As this is an example I will state what each value represents
# 0 = Black background
# 1 = Brick block 
# - Is a place holder to represent the space where a collidable object would go

1111111------------------1111111
1111111---000000000000---1111111
1111111-0000000000000000-1111111
1111111-0000000000000000-1111111
1111111-0000000000000---11111111
1111111-000000000000--1111111111
1111111-00000000000--11111111111
1111111-0000000000--111111111111
1111111-000000000--1111111111111
1111111-00000000--11111111111111
1111111----------111111111111111
11111111111111111111111111111111

END
